Class SpaceshipMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.map.SpaceshipMap

  • public class SpaceshipMap
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that defines the type for a spaceship map object.
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio, Matteo Pagliari

      • findNearSectors

        public java.util.Map<Coordinate,Sector> findNearSectors(Coordinate c)
        Parameters:
        c -
        Returns:
        the sectors that are at distance 1 from the coordinate we pass as a parameter
        See Also:
        "http://www.redblobgames.com/grids/hexagons/#neighbors"

      • isReachableInNMoves

        public boolean isReachableInNMoves(Coordinate start,
                          Coordinate destination,
                          int n)
        DFS to check if a destination is within a distance of n. Arguably a BFS could have been a better choice for this application, but we get good performance with DFS for our average use (distance is usually less than 3, often if the player is moving forward it performs only one check)
        Parameters:
        start -
        destination -
        n -
        Returns:
        true or false

      • getSectors

        public java.util.Map<Coordinate,Sector> getSectors()
        Returns:
        the sectors with their coordinates
